original_text: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.
korean_text: 잠시 후에는 악인이 없어지리니 네가 그 곳을 자세히 살필지라도 없으리로다

sentences.original_text: and the wicked shall not be
yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 너는 그의 곳을 주의 깊게 살펴볼 것이요
